title: Value semigroups and good semigroups 
subtitle: and applications to curve singularities and one-dimensional rings

### Catania 17-19 June, 2026

A non-exaustive list of topics included in the workshop is:

- numerical semigroups;
- monomial curves;
- value semigroups and good subsemigroups of $\mathbb N^d$;
- algebroid branches;
- algebroid curves;
- one-dimensional analytically unramified local rings;
- semigroup of curves with one place at infinity.

There will be up to 20 talks.

### Registration

There are no registration fee, but registration is mandatory to participate. Please, use this [link](https://forms.gle/VdptPHU3YYgUwzoXA) to register or propose a talk.

Deadline for registration and talk proposals: 15 March 2026.
